resp = client.search(
    index="news",
    query={
        "match": {
            "content": "elasticsearch"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "sample": {
            "sampler": {
                "shard_size": 100
            },
            "aggs": {
                "keywords": {
                    "significant_text": {
                        "field": "content",
                        "filter_duplicate_text": True
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
